alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Elmore, Montgomery and Tallapoosa. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Dadeville, Coosada, Eclectic, Jacksons` Gap, Emerald Mountain, Martin Dam, Blue Ridge, Western Lake Martin, Southern Lake Martin, Auburn University In Montgomery, Still Waters Resort, Lagoon Park, Eastdale Mall, Eastern Lake Martin and Bob Woodruff Lake.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
